tips: Calculate exact damage to determine if Potion prevents a knockout
Most competitive decks skip Potion in favor of more impactful Trainers
Can be useful in budget decks or casual play
Better in slower, defensive strategies than aggressive decks
Consider Super Potion instead if your deck can afford the Energy cost for 40 healing
Free to play with no cost, so there's no downside when it does prevent a KO

rulings.ruling: Remove up to 2 damage counters (20 damage) from 1 of your Pokemon
You can choose any of your Pokemon (Active or Benched) to heal
If the Pokemon has only 1 damage counter, remove only 1 (you can't heal undamaged Pokemon)
You cannot use Potion on a Pokemon with no damage counters
Potion has no additional cost - simply remove the damage when played
This is one of the simplest healing effects in the game
